fn.p: Author Contributions L.M.T., A.G. and I.K. conceived the study. L.M.T., A.R., M.N.V and A.G. carried out the experiments. L.M.T. was responsible for the biochemical determinations. A.D.T. carried out the mussel toxin analyses. G.S.K. was responsible for culturing the V. parahaemolyticus and the mussel V. parahaemolyticus quantification (RT-PCR). L.M.T., J.N.H. and C.A. carried out the statistical analyses. L.M.T., C.A. and A.G. led the writing. All authors commented on the initial version of the manuscript.
